name: Full Host Expander
short_description: Expand your free Host's space FOR FREE! You'll only need a GMail Account, an FTP account, or a (MySQL) Database!. It's ideal for hotlinking Images, Videos, Music, or storing your Web Site, PHP Scripts, etc.
